description:
If variety is the spice of life, then this long sleeve is spicy. With its padded wind resistant front and wool insulated arms and back, you can wear this long sleeve standalone, over a base layer or as a mid-layer to give you a variety of options. Whether you are running year-round or crushing some tracks in the forest, you can find any excuse to grab this.

  • Ripstop polyester front is wind resistant, so you can focus on the run and not the cold
  • Front panel is lightly insulated with a wool and polyester technical blend that keeps you warm and comfortable on those cold winter runs
  • A half YKK® zipper with chin guard is there to keep you protected but gives you ventilation when you get too hot
  • Thumbhole cuffs allow for perfect arm placement, not even Jack Frost can get in
  • Added reflective details shine bright for a worry-free time on the trail
name: B Daehlie Long Sleeve Protection - Men's
